page.title: Barracuda Regal Title
page.t: The Regal Barracuda is a modifed and improved version of the Borons heavy fighter for the elite forces of Royal Boron Navy. Thanks to advanced computing systems, this heavy fighter can be equipped with two automated turrets.\n\nDue to the changed mission profile, the ship's maneuverability has been reduced in favor of stronger shields and more powerful engines.
